synopsis.text: Strange weather phenomena have recently plagued the kingdom of Hyland, damaging crops and impacting citizen health. When an ominous cloud appears over the town of Guriel, Princess Alisha Diphda grows concerned and dispatches her subordinate Crem to investigate. However, after two weeks without word, the courageous and dutiful Alisha decides to take matters into her own hands. Accompanied by her attendants, she heads towards Guriel herself to uncover the source of these abnormalities. What she discovers is a threat more severe than anyone could have imagined, testing the limits of even this seasoned warrior princess. Though the path ahead is perilous, Alisha braces herself to defend her beloved kingdom no matter the cost.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
